name: Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
chief_complaint: My nose won't stop running and my eyes are so itchy!
prognosis: Excellent with proper management; symptoms typically resolve when allergen exposure ends
description: An IgE-mediated hypersensitivity reaction to airborne allergens (commonly pollen, mold spores) causing inflammation of nasal passages and conjunctiva. Most prevalent during spring/fall pollen seasons.
risk_factors: outdoor exposure during high pollen counts
